      public ArrayList<String> ProcuraToken(String token, int logado) throws SQLException, RemoteException
      Function that finds the urls (1) where we can find a certain token If the user is looged in, he can also see the links that point to the first urls (1)
      Specified by:
      ProcuraToken in interface IBarrelRemoteInterface
      Parameters:
      token - token to find
      logado - 1 if is a logged in client 0 if not
      Returns:

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws SQLException
      Function that connects the barrel to the database. If it is a new barrel, it will fill his database with the information that the others already have. If it is not new, it will request a hashmap with the information that he dont have.
      Parameters:
      args -
      Throws:
      SQLException
